page.title: 01LANDSCAPE REVIEW : LANGTON
page.content: THE{LANGTON HERRRING}AREA UNSPOILT AND PICTURESQUE, SITUATED BETWEEN{ {CHICKERELL}AND{ABBOTSBURY}REVEALS A COUNTRY-SIDE OF GENTLE ROLLING HILLS AND SECLUDED WOODED AREAS AND VALLEYS. THIS AREA IS MAINLY AGRICULTURAL LAND WITH TWO SMALL VILLAGES AND 8 FARMS.THE MAIN{B3157 ROAD}RUNS STRAIGHT THROUGH THE MIDDLE OF THE 12km SQUARED AREA.SITUATED ON THIS ROAD IS THE{VICTORIA INN}AND{BAGWELL {FARM CAMP SITE}.THE VILLAGE OF{LANGTON {HERRING,WEST}OFF THE{B3157}OFFERS A DIRECT ACCESS TO THE{FLEET,A MILE {THERE AND BACK}.THE SHORELINE IS MUDDY AND FULL OF SHELLS.ABOUT 100 METRES ACROSS THE{BACKWATER} IS{CHESIL BANK} .THE{FLEET BACKWATER}IS UNSAFE FOR SWIMMING AND ALSO THE OPEN SEA OFF{ {CHESIL BANK}BECAUSE OF STRONG UNDERCURRENTS.
